name: Ketamine Cube V2
description:
A game about a cube named "Ketamine" saving the world, that's literally it. 

I wasn't planning to release this game since it was my first but I wanted to see what the process was like. I had so much fun working on this game and can't wait to work on bigger projects :)

Default Controls:

A - Move Left
D - Move Right
ESC or P - Pause

Credits:

Created by: Lonzy
